content: just a simple frog with a hinge style mouth he has a long tongue to stow away or let dangle out he s a cutie and pretty simple just a bit of construction required when it comes to sewing all the pieces on please do not redistribute copy or sell this pattern please credit the craftzilla when selling any final products materials e 3 5 hook green yarn pink yarn white yarn 2 tiny pieces of black felt button eyes safety eyes 5mm or beads glue gun optional for felt eyes yarn needle you can find me on facebook if you have further questions https //www facebook com/thecraftzilla/ or you can look at my blog for more patterns http //thecraftzilla blogspot com/ enjoy
